title: Fetch Papers from ArXiv
description: Configure and fetch research papers automatically
descriptionFetching: You can close this dialog and continue working. Progress will be shown at the top.

arxivIds.label: arXiv IDs
arxivIds.help: Enter one or more arXiv IDs, separated by commas. Format: YYMM.NNNNN (e.g., 2301.12345)

errors.noIds: Please enter at least one arXiv ID

infoBox.title: What's AI analysis?
infoBox.description: Configure an API key to enable automatic paper classification, relevance scoring, and detailed insights. Without an API key, papers will be saved without AI processing.

apiKeyStatus.quickAnalysis: Quick analysis will be performed automatically (relevance scores + tags)
apiKeyStatus.hasOtherKey: You have {{otherProvider}} API key configured, but not for {{provider}}. Switch provider above or configure {{provider}} key.
apiKeyStatus.noAnalysis: Papers will be saved without AI analysis

asyncMode.label: Analysis Mode
asyncMode.syncDesc: Process papers one at a time. Safer for API rate limits, but slower.
asyncMode.asyncDesc: Process multiple papers simultaneously. Much faster, but may hit rate limits.
asyncMode.maxConcurrentDesc: Number of papers to process simultaneously (1-5). Higher values are faster but may exceed API rate limits.

language.label: Response Language
language.enDesc: AI will respond in English. Recommended for better accuracy.
language.zhDesc: AI 将用中文回复。更适合中文用户，但可能略微降低准确性。

deepAnalysis.label: Deep Analysis
deepAnalysis.description: Generate detailed summaries, key insights, and engineering notes (uses more tokens)
deepAnalysis.modeStandardDesc: Introduction + Conclusion analysis with novelty and effectiveness scores
deepAnalysis.modeFullDesc: Full paper analysis (excluding appendices, references) with experiment completeness, flowcharts, and complexity analysis

minRelevance.label: Min Relevance Score
minRelevance.description: Papers with score below this threshold will be filtered out and not saved.

threshold.label: Deep Analysis Threshold
threshold.description: Saved papers with score at or above this threshold will receive full deep analysis.
